pageContext.claim: “We have regulation. We have a lot of regulation. We have good regulation. But you don't need 20 years to get rejected from building a highway. We can reject you in two years or one year. We have it down from seventeen years, down to two.”
pageContext.analysis: This is a wide exaggeration. According to our friends at Politifact, recent government studies say the permit approval time ranges from 4.6 to 6.6 years. The only study that claims a 10-year approval is common comes from a pro-deregulation group, which raises questions about its reliability. This still falls short of Trump's 20 year claim.
